description:
######## 50% Off ########
•	Idea Organizer is a powerful tool that organizes all your ideas, reminders and notes in all formats like text, pictures, voice, video or a combination of the above.
•	Are you forgetting your ideas or are you unable to refer ideas after some time. Then this app for you.
•	This app is suitable for all.
•	This app is password protected. You can enable and disable password protection.
FEATURES:
•	By using this application you can keep track of all your ideas.
•	You can add idea in terms of text or picture or audio or video
•	Search idea based on the description.
•	Link and unlink unlimited number of recorded voice memos with your existing ideas.
•	Link and unlink up to unlimited photos with any of your ideas.
•	Usage of this app is password protected. You can enable and disable password protection.
•	This app will allow you to share your text and photos via email to your team members. 
•	Unlimited recording time.
•	You can delete all recorded ideas.
versionNote: Added auto correction, and fixed the known issues.
